actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the law with respect to citizenship at birth of certain children born abroad of United States citizens.
short_title: Overseas American Children's Human Rights Act of 1989

summary.text: Overseas American Children's Human Rights Act of 1989 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to grant U.S. national and natural-born citizen status to certain persons born outside the United States.

titles.title: Overseas American Children's Human Rights Act of 1989
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the law with respect to citizenship at birth of certain children born abroad of United States citizens.
